mapper.select: SELECT db.dashboard_id, db.report_detail_id, db.result_summary, db.brand_rate1, db.brand_rate2, db.brand_rank, db.domain_rate1, db.domain_rate2, db.brand_mention, rd.ai_type, rd.json_data FROM dashboard db JOIN report_detail rd ON db.report_detail_id = rd.report_detail_id WHERE rd.report_id = #{reportId}

SELECT d.dashboard_id, d.report_detail_id, d.result_summary, d.brand_rate1, d.brand_rate2, d.brand_rank, d.domain_rate1, d.domain_rate2, d.brand_mention, rd.ai_type, CASE WHEN rd.ai_type = 'chatgpt' THEN 'ChatGPT' WHEN rd.ai_type = 'gemini' THEN 'Gemini' WHEN rd.ai_type = 'claude' THEN 'Claude' ELSE rd.ai_type END as ai_type_name, rl.keyword FROM dashboard d JOIN report_detail rd ON d.report_detail_id = rd.report_detail_id JOIN report_list rl ON rd.report_id = rl.report_id WHERE rd.report_detail_id = #{report_detail_id} ORDER BY rd.ai_type
